page.title: 07GREEN'S FARM SHOP
page.content: This is a family business selling pro_ duce grown on the 9 acre holding. Successional sowings of the following are made throughout the season:_ peas, cauliflowers,cabbages,calabrese,beet_ root,lettuce,radishes,spring onions, carrots; single plantings of potatoes, brussels sprouts,onions,leeks,swedes, parsnips,marrows,courgettes,tomatoes, peppers,cucumbers,runner beans,French beans,broad beans.Soft fruit includes strawberries,raspberries,gooseberries, & blackcurrants with surplus made into preserves sold in the shop.Various pot & bedding plants are grown.Dahlias & chrysanthemums are sold as cut flowers also herbaceous,wall_ & everlasting flowers.Protection is by 310sq.mtrs.of glasshouses & tunnels.200 tons of farm yard manure annually maintain fertility.Pollination is by bees hived in the apple orchard.
